meanings.definition: To attend an event or meeting with someone else.
meanings.sent1: I coattends the party with my friend.
meanings.sent2: She always coattends the weekly team meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat coattends the dog to the vet.
meanings.sent4: The stars coattends the moon in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The siblings coattends the family reunion joyfully.

meanings.definition: To be present at the same time as someone else.
meanings.sent2: Students often coattends classes with their friends.
meanings.sent3: The sun coattends the moon during the eclipse.
meanings.sent5: The birds coattends the sunrise with their chirping.

meanings.definition: To accompany someone to an event or meeting.
meanings.sent1: He coattends his grandmother to the doctor's appointment.
meanings.sent2: Friends usually coattends each other to social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The umbrella coattends the rain to the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The loyal dog coattends its owner everywhere.
